name: RTCIceCandidateStats.address
description: The address property of the RTCIceCandidateStats dictionary indicates the address of the ICE candidate. While it's preferred that the address be specified as an IPv4 or IPv6 numeric address, a fully-qualified domain name can be used as well.

refs.name: Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCIceCandidateStats.address' in the 'Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API' specification.
